title: H.J. Maxwell: railroad engineer
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles. Dept. of Theater Arts and Trevor Greenwood
brief_description: A student documentary interview with H.J. Maxwell as he talks about his nearly 50 years with the Santa Fe Railway. Shows Maxwell working in the rail yards and looks at various procedures and different types of engines.
creator_credit_for_label: University of California, Los Angeles. Dept. of Theater Arts and Trevor Greenwood
